room_title: Escape room "Beyond Detention" by Escape Rooms at Chittyville in Herrin
room_description: The Vice Principal went mad with authority! The Principal got lucky and locked him into the Detention cell by tricking him. Little did the Principal know that the Vice Principal was prepared for such an instance. When the power came back on, he had vanished. It is your group's mission to make the School safe again. Figure out all the clues to find out how he escaped. Or did he?
